name: Waking Nightmare
description: Two innocent children named Olivia and Thomas are in trouble. They are trapped in a nightmare dimension, where all of their greatest fears come true. Both of them have no idea where they are or why they are there in the first place. In this 2D Horror Platformer game, both of them must confront both of their greatest fears; germs, insects, and of course…. The Dark! Will they manage to get out of the nightmare realm alive, or will they be added to the nightmare’s collection?
